content.rendered:
beauty bar in roncesvalles | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar on roncesvalles, toronto. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeAtTen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up

Get Directions

Add Waypoint
show options hide options
Print directions Reset directions
Fetching directions......
Reset directions
Print directions
beauty bar in queen west | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 117 roncesvalles avenue
    toronto, ontario
  • 416-613-0258
  • roncesvalles@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon. - wed: 9:00 am – 6:00 pm

thu. - fri: 9:00 am – 7:00 pm

sat. - sun: 9:00 am – 5:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

I go to Ten Spot to get my waxing done, and Nelia always makes sure to provide the best service possible. She is so easy going and professional, you will feel at ease right away. Thank you Nelia for being the best ♥️
Alisa Popova
1720515118
Melissa is great for waxing! Professional, kind, thorough, fast — couldn’t be better.Booking is very straightforward and front desk staff are consistently lovely.
Hayley B
1716839694
It’s always scary trying a new place for waxing treatments but the Ten spot lives up to its name. 10/10 super clean, friendly, efficient and kinda relaxing actually. Tanya is so professional and meticulous. I’ll definitely be back.
Katrina Bautista
1716739614
Great salon! The space is meticulously clean and service is efficient. I’ve been seeing Melissa for laser and waxing for a couple of years - lovely person, precise attn to detail while fast, and keeps me distracted during the painful bits 😅
Liz Faria
1715772872
Melissa is great for waxing! Professional, kind, thorough, fast — couldn’t be better.Booking is very straightforward and front desk staff are consistently lovely.
Hayley B
1715299227
Melissa is the BEST. I had trust issues after my eyebrows were demolished by a different aesthetician elsewhere and now after seeing her for 3 months my brows are back to their full glory. She's fast, she's knowledgable and always has a positive energy. Highly recommend!
Tina Deganutti
1712851778
I love the place and Sara is the best! ( we do need to wait longer. The polish on my big toes was all messy!)
Frederic Lacombe
1711733314
Lovely experience. I had a wax and a pedicure, and I ended up in a bit of a rush at the end and had to head out before my nails were totally dry. I had tight socks and shoes. The person who helped me was super helpful in giving me some extra protection w Vaseline and a wrap after checking in a few... times to make sure I was ok with the risk and I appreciated that… all the more bc my pedicure turned out perfect, even with me leaving early:)read more
Natalie K
1705032907
Been coming to the Ten Spot on Roncy for over a year and they never disappoint! All the staff are extremely friendly, go above and beyond on client service and the place is always super clean! They is no ego here... you are treated with respect and greeted with a genuine smile. The staff make it... a point to understand your mood whether you want to chat away or relax in silence they know exactly how to adjust to you! Melissa is the best waxer I have ever had... she makes the process as painless as possible and really listens if you have questions or concerns. Tanya is sweet, filled with knowledge if you go in for a facial. The staff are all wonderful as they are skilled and the standard here is high for quality of service! Thank you for always making me feel seen and for the high quality you always bring with every service I have!read more
Amanda Labedzki
1704047544
This place is a 10 out of 10! The space is very clean and tidy. The staff are super friendly. The playlist they had going was fun to listen to. The experience overall was exceptional! I booked a gel manicure with Anna and let me tell you, she is amazing! She took the time, care and paid attention... to detail. I will definitely be back.read more
Lindsay Santiago
1700974625
Neila was great to chat to. She was professional and my nails do look great! The one thing i always notice is my nailbeds are never painted right to the edge where the bed and skin meet. I'll keep an eye out next time.
Marjorie Richards
1696612591
Melissa is a gem. She is really caring, efficient and professional while a truly cool and friendly person. Everyone here is lovely. Great prices for great service. I traveled for 40 minutes just to use their service! It shows they are really amazing! Thanks
Michelle Assay
1696444684
LOVE the Roncy location! Very clean as you expect with a ten spot and polite staff. The esthetican Amanda who performed my waxing service was professional and did a great job! I’ll be back, and have added an additional service to experience here. Thanks ladies, I left feeling like a TEN! 🧡
Mell0_ 90
1652747529
‹
›
